curvostylata Fan & Chen
in

subSubSection.paragraph: Preservation: pinned; specimen intact.

Paratype male with labels: (1) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “
Qinghai Yushu
/
Mountain of Jiegu
/ Chinese Academy of Sciences ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “19
75. VI .30
/ collector
Zhizi Chen
”; (3) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “
Engyneura curvostylata
/ sp.n. / Identifier: Zide Fan, 1976 ”
.
Preservation: pinned; specimen intact.

Paratypes : 5 males with the same labels respectively: (1) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “

/ Chinese Academy of Sciences ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “19

/ collector

curvostylata
/ Fan et Chen ”
.

curvostylata
